name: My best friend 1.1
description:
My compo entry made in 48 hours for the Ludumdare 43, with the theme Sacrifices must be made.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/my-best-friend

This was also my first compo ever!

If you happen to find any bugs or have any kind of problems, feel free to post a comment!

Thank you for playing!

Twitter: @Shen_dev
